text:
Benefits and benefits delivery

Are you receiving any sort of public or employment benefits, such as Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP), Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF), Social Security Income (SSI) or others?

title: RAPID Survey Report
text:
Employment and income


CPAL.JOB.008

Current employment status

Rate of response: 98.76%









Annual2023Income

Reported income from last year

Rate of Response: 92.95
Median Income: $55,000
Maximum Income: $244,328,607,172


The Dallas County median income in 2021 was $65,011, so this survey sample is poorer than Dallas County as a whole.







POVERTYLine2023

Above or below poverty line

Rate of response: 91.56%


The Dallas County poverty rate in 2021 was 14%, so this survey sample is poorer than Dallas County as a whole.







CPAL.EHQ.001

Which of the following best describes what has happened to your family income in the past month?

Rate of response: 95.71%


 
53% of respondents report a decrease in monthly income, while only 11% report an increase.










46% of respondents with at least one child aged 6 or younger report a decrease in monthly income, compared to 13% reporting an increase.




CPAL.EHQ.002

Which of the following best describes your family financially at this time?

Rate of response: 96.15%


 
62% of respondents report at least some family financial problems.





White respondents are least likely to report any financial hardships.





76% of those under the poverty line report family financial problems, as do 59% of those above the poverty line.







CPAL.FSTR.001

In the past month, how hard has it been for your family to pay for the very basics like food, housing, medical care, and heating?

Rate of response: 96.51%


 
57% of respondents say paying for basics is difficult.










75% of respondents reporting difficulty paying for basics are over the poverty line.







56% of respondents with at least one child 6 years old or younger report difficulty paying for basics.

CPAL.DEBT.007

Current employment status

Rate of response: 96.29%









In total, only 17.35% of respondents say that both their heating and cooling always work at home.

Is your home’s heating equipment able to keep you warm in the winter?

Rate of response: 77.60%

Is your home’s cooling equipment (air conditioning, fans, etc.) able to keep you cool in the summer?

Rate of response: 77.53%









CPAL.MH.009

In the last 30 days, were you evicted from the place you rented?

Rate of response (renters): 95.83%
Rate of response (total): 68.51%









CPAL.MH.010

In the last 30 days, was your mortgage foreclosed on?

Rate of response (homeowners): 96.89%
Rate of response (total): 20.36%


 





Over 9% of homeowners report being foreclosed on in the past 30 days.







Most homeowners make less than $100,000, as do all who were foreclosed on.
